attributes.action: Split BT and Openreach up as they are not serving the public interest
attributes.background: We moved into a new build home on 9 Dec 2015. BT had been informed of the exact date 5 weeks earlier. By the middle of Jan we still had no phone line or internet so we sacked them and employed Virgin. Within two weeks Virgin had us up and running.

rejection.details:
This isn't something that the Government or Parliament could do. This would be a decision for Ofcom, which is independent of Government and Parliament. You can find out more about Ofcom here:

http://www.ofcom.org.uk/
